events.comment: exitSelected: keeps track if player is hovering over play (0) or exit (1)

Scene Variables:

muted: 1 = mute music 0 = unmute
mutedFlag: checks to see if state has changed
options: 2 = sound 1 = exit 0 = play
soundSelected: s/e
exitSelected: s/e
playSelected: s/e
Toggles the sign arrow in accordance to the keyboard input

Options:
0 = none selected
1 = music
2 = play
3 = exit
Starts the game and changes scene to the instructions. Allows for mouse control as well.
Quits the game
Mutes music

objects.name: InstructionsText
objects.string:
Use your ARROW KEYS 
        to move your snowball around.

      Be careful to avoid the obstacles.
             They'll make you small!

         Aim to get as large as possible,
               and earn all 3 medals 
           (5000 points for the gold!)
without hitting anything on the way down.

objects.name: AvoidText
objects.string:
This is an example of 
what you need to avoid.

objects.name: powerupsExplanation
objects.string:
Collect these to gain
powers for a brief period!

events.comment: Hides arrow.
Pressing ready progresses the user onto the actual game.
Hovering over ready shows the arrow

objects.name: DevControls
objects.string:
Developer Controls:
"1" End game
"2" Restart game
"3" Toggles invincibility
"k" Display statistics

events.comment:
Variables:

GLOBAL: 
score: keeps track of the player's points
seconds: time elapsed since playing
muted: boolean expression 1 = muted 0 = playing

LOCAL:
obstacleDirection: degree that the global force is applied to (270 degrees = up).
obstacleSpeed: speed at which obstacles go up.
sizeDecrease: how much to subtact from the scale of the snowball when it collides.
sizeIncrease: how much to add to the scale of the snowball as the game goes on.
speedIncrease: how much to add to the speed of the snowball as the game goes on.
speedDecrease: how much to subtract to the speed of the snowball when it collides.
snowballSpeed: how fast the snowball goes
state: 0 = Game hasn't started, 1 = Game in action
invincibility: toggles if snowball can collide with objects or not - for DevControls. 0 = Disabled 1 = Enabled
devInvincibility: overrides invincibility powerup
invinciblityFlag: keeps track of if DevControls are enabled
stats: toggles showing game stats - for DevControls. 0 = Disabled 1 = Enabled
statsFlag: keeps track of if DevControls are enabled
seconds: stores time elapsed in-game
tempTimer: ????
entities: how many game objects are in the screen at any one time
entityFlag: keeps track if object has left the screen or not

collisionFlag: keeps track if the user has collided with something for sound purposes 0 = not collided 1 = collision

powerupFlag: keeps track of if the user has picked up a powerup
invincibilityFlag: toggles if snowball can collide with objects. 0 = disabled  1 = enabled
slowFlag: toggles if snowball is slowed. 0 = disabled 1 = enabled
speedFlag: toggles if snowball is fast. 0 = disabled 1 = enabled

powerUpChoice: chooses a powerup to show the user every so-and-so seconds; 0 = none 1 = invincibility 2 = slow 3 = speed
powerUpTimer: keeps track of how often to show powerups (should be between 5 - 20 seconds)
Hiding text and powerups

invincibilityTimer, speedTimer, slowTimer: how often the power appears
powerupTimer: time elapsed since the selected power has been activated
gameplayTimer: how long the game has been running for (used for more obstacles)

parameters:
"FPS: " + ToString(round(1/TimeDelta())) + NewLine() +
"Entities: " + ToString(Variable(entities)) + NewLine() + 
"Time Played: " + ToString(GlobalVariable(seconds)) + "s"

events.comment: Pressing Space starts the game.
Creating obstacles every few seconds
Entity count
Initialising obstacle movement to start the game.
If the snowball collides with any obstacles, it decreases in size and you lose points. Only collides as long as DevControls aren't enabled.
Snowball cannot be out of bounds.

Snowball gradually gets bigger and adds towards the score. 
Obstacles also slowly gets faster.
Timer counting how long the user has been playing starts.
If the temptimer has started:
If Snowball size is less than 10x13, it changes the state to 2 and ends the game.
powerUpTimer must be greater than 5-20 secs before the game chooses a powerup to show
If powerUpChoice is 1, release an invincibility powerUp
Invincibility only lasts 3 seconds
If powerUpChoice is 2, release a slow powerUp
Slow lasts 7 seconds
If powerUpChoice is 1, release a speed powerUp
Speed only lasts 5 seconds
Reset the powerUpChoice
"1" ends the game. "2" toggles invincibility.
exitSelected: keeps track if player is hovering over restart (0) or exit (1)
Toggles the sign arrow in accordance to the keyboard input
Restarts the game and changes scene to FirstLevel
Quits the game
